item.title: Ghost blog caching with Varnish
item.description: In this post I show a few of my tip’s for using Varnish for caching and Ghost together. Don’t cache everything Caching is good, but we don’t want to cache everything in ghost, we don’t want to cache the admin and preview pages in ghost. Add the following in the sub vcl_recv part. # Did not cache the admin and preview pages if (req.url ~ "/(admin|p|ghost)/") { return (pass); } restart Varnish to activate the changes.
